description:
Learn about the best new features of the GNOME 47 desktop environment, which brings a considerable set of new features and updates.

The post GNOME 47: Best New Features appeared first on Linux Today.
title: GNOME 47: Best New Features

description:
Ubuntu-based Rhino Linux 2024.2 brings a sparkling new theme, an upgraded Wiki, and advanced containerization.

The post Rhino Linux 2024.2 Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Rhino Linux 2024.2 Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
Immich 1.113, a self-hosted photo and video backup solution, rolls out new folder views, tags, and enhanced mobile sync capabilities.

The post Immich 1.113 Unveils Folder View and Enhanced Tagging appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Immich 1.113 Unveils Folder View and Enhanced Tagging

description:
Stable Debian 12 (Bookworm) is getting its seventh update, shipping with 51 bug fixes and 55 security updates. Upgrade now!

The post Debian 12.7 Rolls Out With Security and Stability Improvements appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Debian 12.7 Rolls Out With Security and Stability Improvements

description:
Armbian 24.8 comes three months after Armbian 24.5 and introduces enhanced stability for RK3588 hardware with the latest bootloader upgrades, smoother visuals with 4K60p video acceleration for KDE Plasma and GNOME images, and full support for the BigTreeTech CB1 IO board for your 3D printing projects.

The post Armbian 24.8 Released With Linux Kernel 6.10, Expanded Desktop Options appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Armbian 24.8 Released With Linux Kernel 6.10, Expanded Desktop Options

description:
Still powered by a Liquorix-flavored Linux 6.9 kernel, Nitrux 3.6.1 looks like a small release that mainly adds support for additional languages, including Ukrainian, Georgian, Korean, Kurdish, Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, Albanian, Serbian, Swedish, Turkish, Catalan, Tatar Crimean, Czech, Welsh, Danish, Greek Modern, Estonian, Persian, Finnish, Irish Gaelic, and Hindi.

The post Nitrux 3.6.1 Immutable and Systemd-Free Distro Improves Language Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Nitrux 3.6.1 Immutable and Systemd-Free Distro Improves Language Support
